verses.text: \w Vindicate|strong="H8199"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* \w my|strong="H7378"\w* \w case|strong="H7379"\w* \w against|strong="H7378"\w* an \w ungodly|strong="H3808"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*; \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w unjust|strong="H5766"\w* men.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H4581"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4581"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w rejected|strong="H2186"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* must \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* sorrow \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H4581"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* enemyâ€™s \w oppression|strong="H3906"\w*?

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w Your|strong="H7971"\w* light \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Your|strong="H7971"\w* truth; \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*. \w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* bring \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Your|strong="H7971"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w place|strong="H6944"\w* \w where|strong="H4908"\w* \w You|strong="H7971"\w* dwell.

Then I \w will|strong="H4196"\w* go \w to|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* God, \w to|strong="H4196"\w* God, \w my|strong="H3034"\w* greatest \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*. I \w will|strong="H4196"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w You|strong="H3034"\w* \w with|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w my|strong="H3034"\w* God.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* downcast, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* unease \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*? Put \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* Savior \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God.
